name: Viki Spotter: Space Mission
description: Puzzle game about finding differences in different pictures. Carefully compare the images and try to find everything they can differ.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: any
